Highest grade in school
Value: 12th, but was enrolled in college for a less than two years

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Value: N/A – But was arrested for impersonating an officer.

Heading: Fired from jobs?
Value: N/A, but his jobs usually ended when he stopped coming to work.

Heading: Types of jobs worked
Value: Series of low end jobs which generally ended when he simply stopped coming to work. Ex, worked for a while as a convenience store clerk. Also at the time of the Reeves abduction, had a self-employed construction agency.

Heading: Employment status during series
Value: Around that time period he had been in and out of prison, so he was being supported by his aunt and his parents.

Heading: Number of children
Value: 0 (Wife had one child before they were married named Eddie)

Heading: Living with
Value: Spouse, and possibly son of spouse

Heading: Been to a psychologist (prior to killing)?
Value: Many times, especially as a condition of probation while a juvenile.

Heading: Time in forensic hospital (prior to killing)?
Diagnosis
Value: Revealed narcissistic personality disorder and a strong repressed hostility towards women. Had compulsive sexual behavior and was frequently manipulative.

Heading: Killer Criminal History (Prior to the series)
Victim type
Value: Young women, in their teens or early twenties.

Killer age at end of series
Date of first kill in series
Date of final kill in series
Weapon
Value: Killer utilized items (pantyhose, electrical wires) that were already at the scene

Heading: How close did killer live?
Value: Drove to and from abductions and crime scenes, but murders generally occurred in New Jersey, around where Reldan lived.

Heading: Location of first contact
Value: Generally, on the street or during a home invasion.

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Victim abducted or killed at contact?
Used blindfold?
Value: No – but in at least one case tried to keep his victim from seeing his face by covering her face with her shirt.

Heading: Bound the victims?
Value: Some were, like Hernandez, but some were not.

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Dumped body in lake, river, etc.
Value: Dumped in wooded areas, or along water (ex, along a river bed)

Heading: Sentence
Value: Two consecutive life sentences, plus 30 years
